title: HOW TO...?
body: Is there any way to add any photo from my pc to a board that i create ?

replies.body: You must upload your image somewhere else online, such as to a common imaging site like imgur/gyazo/snag.gy. Once it's there, just right click the image, copy image URL/address, and paste that in your post.
TY sir for taking your time to answer me .
